abstract: Warren E. Buffett revealed the $10 billion-plus stake Berkshire Hathaway has built in I.B.M. on Monday, after a disclosure dispensation very few get.
snippet: Warren E. Buffett revealed the $10 billion-plus stake Berkshire Hathaway has built in I.B.M. on Monday, after a disclosure dispensation very few get.
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission usually doesn’t let investors keep many secrets. Except if you’re a major player like Warren Buffett.

headline.main: One Secret Buffett Gets to Keep
